abstract: Democratic Reps Andre Carson and Keith Ellison, both Muslims, describe effect of Donald J Trump's anti-Muslim proposals on them professionally and personally; feel they must remain on defensive despite broad condemnation of Trump by their congressional colleagues, and open acceptance of Muslims practicing their faith on Capital Hill.
lead_paragraph: “It would be unacceptable and even un-American for me to not speak up and fight back,” said Representative André Carson of Donald J. Trump’s call to bar members of his faith from entering the United States.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Words Have Added Sting for 2 Muslims in Congress
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Words Have Added Sting for 2 Muslims in Congress

snippet: “It would be unacceptable and even un-American for me to not speak up and fight back,” said Representative André Carson of Donald J. Trump’s call to bar members of his faith from entering the United States.
